moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.description: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

moves.name: Retaliate
moves.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves. If used in succession, its chance of failing rises.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. It also cuts the user's Defense and Sp. Def.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
